page.title: 20 A Typical Saturday
page.content: When I wake up, I go into the front room and watch television. If there's nothing interesting I go back to bed. About an hour later I go back and watch T.V. again, until breakfast is on the table. That's about 10 o'clock. After Breakfast I get dressed. I usually go out and play with my rubber tyre (swing). After that mum asks me to take the dog for a walk. When I come back, dinner is usually on the table, (sandwiches or boiled egg). After lunch we go for a walk or watch T.V. If it is boring I ask mum to play catch with me. By then mum starts making the tea so I play football. When mum has made the tea we chomp it up as fast as we can so I can watch T.V. After I have watched T.V. for two hours I get ready for bed.
